name: The Last spark (Landerack)
description: Game created as COMPO entry to ludum dare. Oh boi. that was my first compo and dear lord. that was a lot of work and stress. but I really love how it turned out. There are lots of pollishes that I'd have liked to do. And currently one bug that shows up very rarely where people's soul doesnt deplete while walking... Which is like one of the most important things.. hmmmm~ oh well. done for now!
